summary:
We need to produce JSON with keys: summary, business_intent, keywords (list). Must not list method names verbatim. Focus on class responsibility and state/behavior. Provide English.

We have class WhisperConfig: configuration class for WhisperModel, defines architecture hyperparameters, token ids, dropout, layerdrop, spec augment, etc. Business intent: to allow users to instantiate Whisper models with specific architecture and behavior, customizing speech recognition models. Keywords: configuration, Whisper, speech recognition, transformer, encoder-decoder, hyperparameters, token IDs, dropout, spec augment, layerdrop, audio classification, etc.

Now produce JSON.

Make sure to start with {{ and end with }} as per example. Provide raw JSON object.

Let's craft summary: "Encapsulates all hyperparameters and settings required to build a Whisper speech‑to‑text transformer model, including vocabulary size, encoder/decoder depth, attention heads, feed‑forward dimensions, dropout rates, token identifiers, and optional data‑augmentation and classification options."

Business intent: "Enable developers to configure and instantiate Whisper models with desired architecture and behavior for automatic speech recognition or audio classification tasks."

Keywords list: include relevant terms.

Now produce JSON.

Check formatting: Must be valid JSON, with double quotes, no trailing commas.

Let's craft.

{
  "summary": "...",
  "business_intent": "...",
  "keywords": [...]
}

Now fill.

Keywords: ["Whisper", "speech recognition", "transformer", "encoder-decoder", "configuration", "hyperparameters", "vocabulary size", "attention heads", "dropout", "layerdrop", "spec augment", "audio classification", "token IDs", "model architecture"]

Now produce final answer.assistantfinal{{"summary": "Encapsulates all hyperparameters and settings needed to construct a Whisper speech‑to‑text transformer model, covering vocabulary size, encoder and decoder depth, attention heads, feed‑forward dimensions, dropout and layer‑drop probabilities, token identifiers, optional SpecAugment augmentation, and classification‑specific options.", "business_intent": "Allow developers to customize and instantiate Whisper models for automatic speech recognition or audio classification by specifying architectural and training‑time parameters in a single configuration object.", "keywords": ["Whisper", "speech recognition", "transformer", "encoder-decoder", "configuration", "hyperparameters", "vocabulary size", "attention heads", "dropout", "layerdrop", "spec augment", "audio classification", "token IDs", "model
